EmailTemplate.name: G&S International Class Info
EmailTemplate.subject: LegalZoom Order# {!Case.Order_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
An International Classification Number will be assigned to your description of products ("goods") and services by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO).
If the class number is not entered on your Trademark application, they will assign a number during their initial review of your application and description. Also, if a class number is entered and the USPTO later determines that the number is incorrect, an Office Action will be issued, requesting you to revise the classification number.
Please note: Although named "international" class, this application is only for protection in the U.S.; the word "international" is used only in the context of the worldwide classification system of which the USPTO is a part of. To view the USPTO's list of classes, please visit {!snippetVariable.tm_gs_classes_list}
{!snippetVariable.ip_gs_closing}
We appreciate you choosing LegalZoom.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
